website_summaries.verdict: A powerful but well-priced gaming setup with a smooth, reliable performance.
pros: Equips a 3.4GHz Ryzen 5 2600 processor with RTX 2060 GPU and A320M motherboard
16GB of RAM guarantees responsiveness, and 3 RBG fan rings provide maximum airflow
cons: The SSD may not provide enough storage for those with large gaming libraries

customer_reviews.title: They delivered me the wrong PC.
customer_reviews.text: I saved up a long time to buy a gaming pc. I decided to buy this one after spending a lot of time looking at the best value for my money. An RTX 2060, 16gb RAM and a sleek white case to go with my white corsair gear seemed pretty cool! Well, I got the box today, looking forward to enjoy my day off playing on my new PC, and found that it's some crummy, ugly black case with a gtx1660. I'm extremely disappointed and my Sunday plan is ruined. Don't buy from Skytech as they apparently don't know how to ship out product.
customer_reviews.author: Samuel Connett

customer_reviews.title: No Working Fans/PC wont start sometimes/
customer_reviews.text: Unhappy with my purchase bought it from the amazon prime event and was my first ever desktop. Plugged everything in and worked great only that the gpu and cpu fans work but not the rest of them. Getting in contact with there service team monday to see if its a small issue like wiring. Will happily give it a 5 star review if this issue is resolved. Update: The computer does not work and the customer service is terrible. When I call there customer service line goes directly to voicemail.
customer_reviews.author: Ryan Heart

customer_reviews.title: Misleading, inaccurate, and no support.
customer_reviews.text: Many things I dislike - no customer service ever responded to me. There were wrong parts. The description (manufacture details and ‘this item’) is misleading, advertising a different PC than I received. The technical specs were close to what I received, but still wrong. I am very disappointed with the buying experience of this product through this manufacturer. UPDATE: they have updated the ad to be consistent on amazon. They still have not contacted me back.

customer_reviews.title: 4.5 stars
customer_reviews.text: This is worth the money for the item. Plug and play, if you already have the peripherals (i.e. monitor), but the mouse that comes with it is multifunction if you don't have one already. My personal keyboard is better than the provided one, and everything works fine. Remote is located in the case FYI, and it's a nice addition. Case is pure white in color, not eggshell or some other off white. There's also a screen filter on the bottom fans that's a nice addition. You can prob build this for $150 less, but the compromise is worth it if you don't have the time (like me). Recommended.
customer_reviews.author: Jay P.

customer_reviews.title: Great PC for gaming and streaming.
customer_reviews.text: Great PC for gaming. MSI RTX if perfect. Destiny 2 running in 60 fps and 4K. Great. Pathfinder, CivVI, ResEvil2. Also I'm using this machine for streaming and making videos. Ryzen5 with RTX it's a miracle. Also great production quality. Very easy to install. I have a couple of questions, how to install additional HDD, but then I just plugged it in USB3 and everything is OK. But if you have some instructions, please let me know, I want to connect it directly to MB. Thank you.
customer_reviews.author: Tigran Arzhanov

customer_reviews.title: Just what I expected! Great job Skytech
customer_reviews.text: I just received the PC I had to call and leave a message with tech support. It calls for 2 WiFi Antenna and it only came with one. I have not heard back from tech support yet so I am hoping to get this small problem taken care of. Now to the good stuff. The PC is exactly as advertised and the quality control seams spot on. I turned it in and it booted right up. I can’t ask for more plug and play. No issues with set up or condition and is very fast.
customer_reviews.author: eric

customer_reviews.title: Bad product, poor customer service
customer_reviews.text: Fans stopped working 2 weeks after connecting. Poor customer support, ended getting refund after a 6 weeks of waiting for replacement. Dont waste your money!
customer_reviews.author: Eric

customer_reviews.title: I love this PC!
customer_reviews.text: The SkyTech Shiva gaming PC has been a great purchase! It plays all my games at the highest settings, encodes 4k video from my GoPro in no time using the crazy fast GeForce RTX 2060. The SSD hard drive makes everything from booting up to loading games happen in no time. One small issue I found; I have some older SSD drives I plan on installing. The InWin case has a place for them behind the back cover, but the wire for the power button and HDD LED was stretched across one of them. I re-routed the wire and I'll get those drives in before long. Easy fix. I definitely recommend this PC for any gamer or content creator!
customer_reviews.author: Chris Bertrand

customer_reviews.title: No Tech Support/ Did Not Work
customer_reviews.text: Computer did not boot up properly. Had a processing error. Tech support texted me back two days after contacting them. Steer clear!
customer_reviews.author: Christina Sharp

customer_reviews.title: So far, so good ... this PC rocks for games; RGB fans a little loud
customer_reviews.text: Compared to an i7 gaming laptop that had some lagging issues, so far this PC is doing great. Paired it with a Viewsonic 144hz gaming monitor and the kiddo is impressed. I'll update in 3 months or so if issues arise. Update: The graphics card is amazing! It has 6GB of DDR6 onboard and can handle everything we've thrown at it so far. The 500G SSD drive is ample for our needs, but if you download a lot of large games I recommend getting a 1 TB HDD drive to store them.
customer_reviews.author: aaron-the-baron

customer_reviews.title: Gaming on this machine is exceptional!
customer_reviews.text: So far so good. Everything I expected and beyond. No matter what I throw at it it does better than any PC I have ever owned in my entire life. Games run and look fantastic, no issue AT ALL with everything on ULTRA. For the price this gaming PC is more than just good it is GREAT!! And I am a tough one to please when it comes to my games. I have only had it a few days and no complaints, I will update this again if anything changes down the road. Only thing that is a bit underwhelming is the SSD, 500 gigs isn't much but it is good enough to start with. HAPPY GAMING!!
customer_reviews.author: Mr. Happy

customer_reviews.title: Great Computer, Controllable Noise
customer_reviews.text: Great computer that can run the latest games on med/high or high/ultra(max) settings depending on the type of game. Controllable LED fans with a remote. You can set the speed of your fans to control the noise level as well! For example, I am a musician so when I am recording I use the remote to set the desktop fans speed down (and use MSI afterburner to control my GPU fan speed), and the room becomes dead silent. I will update this review a year from now, but so far everything has been working great! Not to mention it looks nice and simple too :).
customer_reviews.author: John Ackerman

customer_reviews.title: Great Buy
customer_reviews.text: I bought this PC for my wife, when her laptop crashed. It is really quite, and plays her games with zero issues. I will definitely buy from them again.
customer_reviews.author: Talon Christy

customer_reviews.title: LOVE IT!
customer_reviews.text: I decided to take a chance on this one after a dismal failure by CyberPowerPC. I think that this is one of the most bang for the buck systems you can buy. The only shortfall is that you may need to expand it's storage if you play a lot of games. If you look on SkyTechs website the specs are different than what I got (but what I received is upgraded). It runs great, I looked and it came overclocked and still runs cool 38-50 degrees C. Smooth frame rates without paying 2 grand. as a + it was also on 5 pay with Amazon (Hey no interest and someone else's money:).
customer_reviews.author: snarfzilla

customer_reviews.title: Great!
customer_reviews.text: I was using a gaming laptop for a while now. I decided to upgrade. I look high and low on amazon looking at many different pcs and finally went with Skytech Shiva Gaming PC Desktop - AMD Ryzen 5 2600, NVIDIA RTX 2060, 16GB DDR4, 500G SSD, RGB Fans. I was happy. PC arrived a day faster than shown. Everything looks packaged really nice, I download steam and all my games. gta, red dead 2, dcuo, pubg, etc plays alot faster than my 1050ti laptop. I would recommend skytech gaming. unsure how to upload pics.
customer_reviews.author: Johnni

customer_reviews.title: Best lockdown medicine
customer_reviews.text: Got this for our 11 year for school work, internet and gaming. Computer came quickly, set up easily and runs everything perfectly. Usually I expect a number of hassles and problems with any new electronics, but this was easy except for one thing--it took us few minutes to figure out how to turn it on. We didn't realize that in addition to the rear on/off there is a not so obvious front switch. This has been a fantastic way to cheer up our youngsters lockdown period and well worth the investment.
customer_reviews.author: S. Griffin

customer_reviews.title: Amazing Desktop, Meets Every Expectation!
customer_reviews.text: Amazing Desktop, Meets Every Expectation! The fans are relatively quiet and keep the computer very cool. There is nice ventilation in the case. The tone of the fines are nice and low, so it doesn't sound like a screeching jet even at full load. The Hardware is Hardware. Good and runs smooth to me! For people into the nerdy part of reviews: SPECS - ProcessorAMD Ryzen 5 2600 Six-Core Processor ManufacturerAMD Speed3.9 GHz Number of Cores12 CPU ID178BFBFF00800F82 Family17 Model08 Stepping2 VD Card - Video CardNVIDIA GeForce RTX 2060 Manufacturer ChipsetGeForce RTX 2060 Dedicated Memory6.0 GB Total Memory14 GB Pixel Shader Version Vertex Shader Version Hardware T & LYes Vendor ID10DE Device1F08 Plug and Play IDVEN_10DE&DEV_1F08&SUBSYS_152719DA&REV_A1 Driver Version26.21.14.4219
customer_reviews.author: Dawn Hotakainen

customer_reviews.title: Great Product with minor problems
customer_reviews.text: I bought this computer so I could get back into gaming. I like the product and for the most part it works great. The only real issue I have is that some of the USB ports don't work at all. I personally am able to fix this myself but I am disappointed that it came out of the box like this. in the package comes a quality control check list which I appreciate, but I wish they would include testing the ports as well. With all that being said I sill am happy with the product.
customer_reviews.author: Carleston Brown

customer_reviews.title: Great buy!!!
customer_reviews.text: When first receiveing this product I was scared. It came in a huge box padded by foam padding. Nice and secure. When you open the second box it was wrapped in a black bag with draw string which is cool! U plugged everything in and my monitor won't connect. I contacted skytech gaming and they helped me with this issue in 2 seconds. I was worried it wouldn't work! Working fine now :) great service and awesome support! Great system! Graphics are awesome.
customer_reviews.author: Sheena and Jason

customer_reviews.title: Great mid to low-high end gaming PC!!!
customer_reviews.text: Everything worked out of the box just fine! I've had this PC for about 2 weeks and I couldn't be any happier. You'll be able to run most, if not all games, at 1080p ultra or 1440p high to ultra settings. Any 4k gaming is possible but don't expect buttery smooth frame rates at high settings. I attached a screenshot of the exact parts that are in this build and I'm glad to say that the prices are exactly the same. These prices are subject to change, obviously. One small gripe I had was that the CPU cooler fan had small amounts of thermal paste on it. Overall, I would highly recommend this PC!
customer_reviews.author: Edmund

customer_reviews.title: Best bang for your buck for sure
customer_reviews.text: This is most definitely the best bang for your buck pc. I currently play MW, CSGO, Valorant, Apex Legends, and LOL. It plays all my games pretty nicely. However, I've noticed one really annoying issue which is that, on multiple occasions, it has randomly shut down completely mid game. The only other thing is that this set up only has 500GB storage so it fills up pretty quickly especially if you play a lot of big file games. The design is great, the colors are pretty, and it comes with a decent mouse and keyboard that also light up. For the price, this computer is a steal. Highly recommend to anyone starting in online gaming.
customer_reviews.author: Daniel J Kim

customer_reviews.title: WRONG CORD!
customer_reviews.text: Could not even get the computer to fire up after we unboxed and installed it. Come to find out, the power cord they supplied was for a monitor, not the actual desktop. Now we have to go out and purchase one somehow on the 4th of July, when I have to be able to work from home on this thing tomorrow morning. When you spent this much money on a product, you shouldn't have to go out buying bloody parts for the thing before you can even be able to turn the bloody thing on! Will update after adventuring out for parts.
customer_reviews.author: amy

customer_reviews.title: Happy with the purchase
customer_reviews.text: Been thinking about upgrading my PC for a while and got this gig on Prime day for seven nine nine as I can't figure out how to build one that cheap. The parts seems to be ok, with video card from MSI and memory from XPG. These two along would probably 2/3 of the price I paid. It runs out of the box, but Skytech people appears to left some 3D benchmark program in the PC, so I guess they did test it before shipping. No complain so far after 2 weeks and really enjoying playing games at ultra :)
customer_reviews.author: CheapTech

customer_reviews.title: No real issues. Just noisier than I expected
customer_reviews.text: Computer seems to run fine. Plays all the games ive tried on it on highest settings. So far Ive played GTA V, COD Warzone, 7 Days to Die, Overwatch with no issue on ultra. My only issue is the noise levels. My son has a gaming computer also and his is almost silent. This one has a steady sound coming from the fans. Its not very loud but its loud enough to notice. Not sure if theres an issue with my
customer_reviews.author: Y. Asturias

customer_reviews.title: Great PC
customer_reviews.text: So it is a lot bigger than my old PC (not a gaming PC) but I am super super happy with this PC. I didn't know it came with a keyboard and mouse which was really nice. I will upgrade them later but for now they are really nice. Super quiet. Was slightly concerned that it might be louder but overall I can barely hear it. Setup was super easy. Instructions for setup were easy to follow. Came in a very well packaged box, my mailman actually had me come and get it from their truck because they didn't want to mess it up. The box it comes in is kinda unwieldy, basically a box inside a box.
customer_reviews.author: Joshua

customer_reviews.title: Great Gaming PC
customer_reviews.text: Been in need of an upgraded PC for quite some time (playing 2020 games on a pc from 2009) and Skytech blew me away. Now I know that anything is an upgrade when it comes to that potato of a computer, but not only has this new PC met all standard performance benchmarks, it typically exceeds them. Beautiful case, RGB has lots of customization options and the removable glass that comes with the case is a very handy feature. If you are like me and completely replacing your machine in favor of something that can handle the latest games, I would definitely recommend this.
customer_reviews.author: Chinny

customer_reviews.title: Works great but arrived broken
customer_reviews.text: The computer runs great, but when it arrived some of the back usb ports were bent. Probably from shipping so I don't fault them for that but the front usb ports didn't work at all either so I sent an e-mail to their support listed on their website without hearing anything back (it's been about two weeks). I managed to figure out the front two usb ports were just unplugged from the motherboard so no big deal but it was a bit of a hassle.
customer_reviews.author: shannon ♡

customer_reviews.title: So Far So Good
customer_reviews.text: Got this for our 12 year-old son who's really into gaming/game creation. He loves it so far. Only complaint is the RGB lights. Out of the box, they continually flash white. There is no built-in controls or software to change them. The skytech page shows several third-party options to use, none of which we've got working so far...
customer_reviews.author: Goddard

customer_reviews.title: Most bang for Buck
customer_reviews.text: Purchased this after doing a bit of research on buying my first gaming PC. I was going to do a winter project and build my own but when comparing dollars it ended up being cheaper to purchase one already assembled. It was very easy to get up and go and can run any game I choose on it. I've really fallen in love with this computer and all that it has to offer. It do recommend installing more hard drive space on it as I am filling it quickly. The mouse and keyboard it comes with are very nice additions as well. I am very happy with my purchase.
customer_reviews.author: Kiersten

customer_reviews.title: GREAT BUILD
customer_reviews.text: Great PC for someone who isn’t extremely a tech person everything was good and ready to go, came packaged up nice and tight. I can play all my games Ultra with great frame rate. Overall very happy with my purchase.
customer_reviews.author: Malik Phillips

customer_reviews.title: Great gaming PC
customer_reviews.text: I have been looking to build a gaming pc for a while. Out sheer luck I stumbled across this machine. Ordered on a Tuesday and it arrived Friday. Very secure packaging and was incredibly easy to set up. I was iffy about the LED lights when I bought the PC, but to my surprise there is a remote that controls the color of the LEDs or if they are even on at all. Overall this thing was well worth the money and I am 100% satisfied!
customer_reviews.author: Amazon Customer

customer_reviews.title: Great gaming rig, even better price!
customer_reviews.text: I couldn't believe my eyes when I saw the price and specs of this gaming PC. For barely above the cost of parts alone you get an expertly built rig, a ton of USB ports, and RGB lights galore with a remote to control them. An amazing buy, made even better when this gem can be bought on payments! I'm currently playing Destiny 2 Shadowkeep with everything on high and I don't believe my FPS dropped under triple digits until I capped it myself. The game runs so buttery smooth I don't know how I was even able to play on my old rig. I will definitely be recommending Skytech Gaming to anyone looking for a PC!
customer_reviews.author: Michael T Forman

customer_reviews.title: Quiet and good build, shipped safely
customer_reviews.text: Super great build at the price point. The shipping is super well packaged, the FPS numbers they posted are accurate, and actually get higher if you are overclocking. Most surprising thing was how quiet the fans are. Even at the highest settings it's less than half the volume of my PS4 when it's playing a game.
customer_reviews.author: Thisguy188

customer_reviews.title: Powerful gaming PC with essential features
customer_reviews.text: Everything looks very nice for the appearance and after testing with different games for a week, it runs very smoothly. the RGB looks lit! Definitely a great choice for a gaming PC at this price. Cons: - the screws attached are not really fit the motherboard. Contacted the customer service, responded very quickly and solved: they sent me a $10 amazon credit to buy the screws i needed. - the jacks for headphone and mic are 2.0 , so if your headphone is 3.0 (with mic on), you have to buy an adapter for that.
customer_reviews.author: darren feng

customer_reviews.title: Go ahead and buy it!
customer_reviews.text: I have not had a gaming rig in five years and this was the perfect machine to start gaming with again. The build quality is great - I love the dark tempered glass, the metal case, and the rgb fans. I did regret that the graphics card was not ASUS as shown in the photo as I would have preferred ASUS much more. Other than that, I cannot complain with this beautiful and very high functioning build. Definitely worth the money!
customer_reviews.author: Ricardo Pagulayan

customer_reviews.title: Great Computer - Great Service - Well Packaged
customer_reviews.text: The computer itself was excellently packaged. inside the Base Unit, all hardware was protected with protected packaging. The first thing I did was download Speccy to ensure the hardware provided was exactly that which was specified in the product advertisement. Indeed it was. I also got an EVGA 2080 Graphics Card. I noticed many people mentioned that the GFX Card can vary in brand and EVGA in my opinion is one of the better brands. I have not had experience with Tech Support, however, the desktop came with support page and support app on the desktop. There was also no bloatware - this is a major plus, as I always usually have to remove all of this.
customer_reviews.author: David Birkin

customer_reviews.title: Its pretty!
customer_reviews.text: First I'd like to say, I built my last PC in 2010 so a LOT has changed since then. Which might make me easily amused. This PC is dope! The PC case itself looks nice. But the lighting which I didnt expect is absolutely awesome! I purchased for the gaming power which is exactly what I wanted. For what you get, $1k is not bad at all. Combined with Amazon's 5 month payment plan is a no brainer! Thank you!
customer_reviews.author: Dellmas Richards

customer_reviews.title: Perfect Starter Gaming PC!
customer_reviews.text: I had been looking for a good pre-built gaming pc that wouldn't break the bank for a while, and this is just about as good a bang for your buck that you're going to get! Handles any games (1st party RPGS, MMO's, FIFA, COD, etc.) at high FPS well. The PC case itself and clean interior build provides easy access for upgradability. Specs are the best you're going to get for this price point in a pre-built that I've seen. Perfect fit for someone just getting into PC gaming that doesn't want to build their own! Would recommend purchasing an external hard drive though (can find them for around $50 on Amazon) since you'll fill up the 500G SSD quickly.
customer_reviews.author: Bradley Connolly

customer_reviews.title: Don't buy prebuilt
customer_reviews.text: Seriously don't buy prebuilt. I could have built this system for $600. Or a better one for $1000 like I already had to do since the motherboard died. Cheap ram, cheap mobo, cheap psu, SUPER cheap fans. Just build your PC for the love of technology. Watch youtube videos, its not hard at all.
customer_reviews.author: Jeremy Alvarez

customer_reviews.title: THE VALUE!!!!
customer_reviews.text: The value for this thing is amazing! Runs 4K at 60 frames for most games. Constantly hitting 200 frames if I play at 1080P. It’s easy to upgrade as well. 500 GB went fast when downloading games, so I threw in a regular 2 TB hard drive. Simple as plug and play. Cords are very neatly organized in the case. Absolutely thrilled to have this. Shipping was fast, and there’s plenty of tech support available with the PC if an issue ever comes up. This is perfect for a new PC gamer! (Switched from Xbox)
customer_reviews.author: Amazon Customer

customer_reviews.title: Strong capable build; bad port placement :(
customer_reviews.text: Only gripe with the computer is that the ports for the graphics card to plug in the HDMI/DVI is to close to the protruding barrier; making it hard to connect my DVI. So I have to use HDMI. Which is still okay because it supports HDMI 2.0 so I can still get 144 refresh rate. But connecting a second monitor might be out of the question unless I figure out the DVI connection.
customer_reviews.author: Nathaniel Elayda

customer_reviews.title: Arrived much sooner than expected.
customer_reviews.text: I really appreciate that it arrived much sooner than the listed date. It is a quiet machine, and so far runs really well. It is quite the upgrade from what I had before. There were some kinks to smooth out, but I think that is to be expected with a brand new machine. So far I'm happy with my purchase.
customer_reviews.author: Carrie Munford

customer_reviews.title: Great starting gaming computer.
customer_reviews.text: The PC came with a ASRock B450M ATX motherboard, Ryzen 5 2600 (as advertised), my GPU model is the Zotac Gaming RTX 2060, DDR4 2x8 GB, 500GB ssd SATA 3 storage. I love the lighting on it. It's very easy to clean the dust out of. The 3d rendering in blender works good.
customer_reviews.author: Cody L. Hess

customer_reviews.title: Best Gaming PC I’ve ever seen!
customer_reviews.text: This is such a beautiful PC! My fiancé bought it and it’s such a huge upgrade from his previous PC. The fact you can change color and it’s remote controlled is absolutely awesome!! It’s runs great and it’s so quiet. The keyboard and mouse that came with it completely complimented the entire look. Absolutely a great investment made. He can play his games with no lag and was able to add a hard drive from his previous PC. The only con he had was you couldn’t add more hard drives to the PC
customer_reviews.author: L.O.M

customer_reviews.title: Solid Gaming PC
customer_reviews.text: I'm not a hardcore gamer but for the occasional PC gaming I do, this PC has been reliable and powerful. When it arrived, I had to reset the memory before it would reboot. However, that procedure was part of the troubleshooting guide and was easy to do. While the case is large, most of my previous PC had mini-towers or smaller and, consequently, probably were overheating when I did any gaming. So, my experience dictated that I get a PC with a roomy case to improve cooling. At some point in the near future, I might try some VR gaming. By every evaluation that I have tried, this PC should be able to handle that.
customer_reviews.author: David

customer_reviews.title: Pictures of computer is misleading
customer_reviews.text: Everything about the computer is pretty great (as far as I can tell). But I bought the computer under the impression that it would have an ASUS NVIDIA graphics card. However I received an MSI NVIDIA graphics card, so I'm pretty disappointed as I prefer ASUS over MSI. As far as the quality of the computer, it's good for it's price but definitely not cool with the misleading pictures of the computer.
customer_reviews.author: Evangeline Chang

customer_reviews.title: Great game computer
customer_reviews.text: I love this computer is working out great for me and my son. We are using it for a streaming on Our YouTube channel, Sassy Pug Gamers. It came with a different keyboard than Shown in the picture. It only annoyed me a little bit, not enough to take a star off of the review. We also bought another computer from them as well.
customer_reviews.author: Kevin P Delaney

customer_reviews.title: Will not boot
customer_reviews.text: Computer would not turn. The online tech support was helpful in trying to talk me through some things to solve the problem, however it still never turned on.
customer_reviews.author: rob

customer_reviews.title: Quiet, Very easy to open, Convenient USB placement, Beautiful
customer_reviews.text: I have only had the PC for a couple of days but have not had any issues. It is very quiet, I hardly hear it compared to my other PC. I would recommend adding another hard drive for extra space. The PC did come with extra entry level keyboards and mouse. Which was a surprise to be sure, but a welcome one. Overall fantastic product, so far.
customer_reviews.author: gabriel garcia

customer_reviews.title: quiet and sexy
customer_reviews.text: lets face it the sexiest things are usually the quietest. And for this babe to be as big as she is and still barely make a sound when she runs, bruh, she's a descendant of jesus christ. buy her, plug her in, and you will never leave her. i swear. the worlds ending, so why not end it with some class ladies and gentlemen.
customer_reviews.author: rA9

customer_reviews.title: Highly recommend
customer_reviews.text: Absolutely love the PC! This thing is lightning fast, the order took a little longer than expected but well worth the wait! There is absolutely nothing I can throw at this thing that will even make it think about slowing down. I would highly recommend anyone to buy this one simply due to the fact that you cant hardily build one of this quality for a comparable price taking into account the time spent assembling it and cable management ect.
customer_reviews.author: Jeff g

customer_reviews.title: He’s sooo happy!!!!!!! 😊
customer_reviews.text: Hello my son was picking out a pc to buy and I decided to get him this one. He told me how this pc handles everything for his day to day gaming. He has not had a single issue with this machine. He also told me that it has little to no noise even with 4 case fans. He has decorated it with an amazing cycle of colors. For it’s price it’s worth every penny it is running as we speak and it has no issues whatsoever please consider this pc if it’s in your budget.
customer_reviews.author: Jackeline Sanchez

customer_reviews.title: Incredible PC!
customer_reviews.text: My husband loves the PC. The color changing ability for the lights and the color keyboard, he just loves it! It runs smoothly and handles his games very well. He's been playing EVE Online lately and just loves how to plays smoothly. I would highly recommend this PC. Its well worth the price!
customer_reviews.author: Molly J. Robinson

customer_reviews.title: Quality
customer_reviews.text: Absolutely Amazing, Looks Great 10/10 Can change fan speed and lights with a remote Very easy set up. Up and playing in about 45 min after updates Pretty dam fast I'm playing total war Rome 2 about 80 fps On ultra 2k Best money spent Tech support kinda sucks Tried to call just to see how it was no response but don't let that hold you back from a great computer
customer_reviews.author: Patrick James Hildreth

customer_reviews.title: the upgrade ability
customer_reviews.text: is a very good pc but is lacking in a lot of places like upgrade ability most people want to upgrade at some point but the motherboard is not very good considering it only has psli gen 3 and not 4 also the psu is not very capable either so i would recommended for people who want something like for now and wont be upgrading
customer_reviews.author: Yariel

customer_reviews.title: Great value, great computer
customer_reviews.text: Computer was packaged very well. Came working right out of the box pleasantly well. It has performed better than expected with all games thrown at it. I do notice the fans after longer play throughs. Only issue I ran into is that I do not have a stable internet connection while being wired in. I’ve troubleshooted different cables/computer. This is the only computer I have (out of 4) that have this issue. I’ve determined it is the computer that has this problem. Because of this I am limited to WiFi only.
customer_reviews.author: Alyssa

customer_reviews.title: Extremely Satisfied
customer_reviews.text: I decided on this computer for one I couldn't find any bad reviews and there is a reason for that... There is absolutely nothing bad I can say about this product. There isn't I game that is out there that doesn't look amazing at max settings. It looks(the system) visually pleasing as well and the remote is an extra perk. You will not be disappointed.
customer_reviews.author: s

customer_reviews.title: Light up the night
customer_reviews.text: Really like how well they did this. Quiet case, everything came working and documentation is comprehensive. I'm really glad I bought this instead of spending the hours to hunt down the parts. It was put together well and it's awesome for gaming. This is exactly what I was looking for.
customer_reviews.author: David Pat

customer_reviews.title: Amazing Gaming Computer
customer_reviews.text: Very easy to set up. Haven't had/used a gaming PC since 2014 and this was a breeze to get going. No issues whatsoever within 24 hours of using it. It has run everything I've thrown at is on the highest settings so far (The Outer Worlds, SW: TOR, The Sims 4) and I am highly satisfied with this product. My girlfriend is impressed by it as well. I would definitely buy another Skytech PC again in the future.
customer_reviews.author: Jared Hatter

customer_reviews.title: Misleading on amount of hard drive
customer_reviews.text: They don't tell you they take almost half the hard drive space for system files. For a gaming PC this is very limiting for the amount of games you can install. Runs great but sucks for hard drive space.
customer_reviews.author: Kimberly A White

customer_reviews.title: Shipped crazy fast!
customer_reviews.text: I was surprised after reading about this company that the computer shipped in less time than Amazon initially quoted for the delivery. It came 3 days after I completed the order, and was packaged very well. So far it runs everything wonderfully, and is a great system for the price.
customer_reviews.author: Chris Kopel

customer_reviews.title: 100% recommended
customer_reviews.text: Ryzen 5 2300 is very suitable for games and VR. If you are looking at this computer, you want to know if it can run. It can and can handle any game you can throw. It is now a regular game. Rtx 2060 is much more powerful than gtx 1060, and comparable to gtx 1070. The game does not work well, this is a PC that will not disappear. However, if there are any, I will update to let you know. If you are looking for a good quality PC that is cheaper than other PCs on the market.
customer_reviews.author: Kris Cervantez

customer_reviews.title: One of the best prebuilt PCs
customer_reviews.text: To make this review short and sweet , this product is amazing. This PC can handle any game or program I throw at it. It can support my oculous rift s and setting it up was as easy as brushing your teeth. If you are looking for a moderately priced gaming PC this is it ! Thank you
customer_reviews.author: Joe Bats

customer_reviews.title: Good pc but not what i expected
customer_reviews.text: Ive had this pc for over a year, i have had no problems with it at all. Its a good pc for the money but what really made me want to get it a long time ago was that it showed 200 fps in fortnite and high fps on other games i play from time to time. And on fortnite i get MAYBE 160 to 180 fps when im in creative but in game i dont go passed 150 which is kinda dissapointing. Other then that i think its a great pc but you wont get as high fps as you think.
customer_reviews.author: Dawson

customer_reviews.title: Very nice gaming computer
customer_reviews.text: Other than it being quite large, the computer has been great. Maybe it's a normal size for a gaming PC, just just seems big compared to other PC's I have owned.
customer_reviews.author: PEnders

customer_reviews.title: Great company, great service.
customer_reviews.text: I got a seal of approval for the computer quality and service! A very good company with an obvious care for its customers. My computer has been working great with a slight tapping/grindingish sound when the pc is maxed out (don’t know what it is since I have no HDD). As long as that doesn’t give me any problems then we’re all good, I have confidence if it did they would take care of me.
customer_reviews.author: Jesse Flora-Miller

customer_reviews.title: As an experienced PC builder, I’ve saved loads of time!
customer_reviews.text: I’ve always been skeptical about buying a premade desktop as I’ve always built my own PCs but felt too lazy this time around. I was not disappointed. It works great, it’s powerful and worth the price. If you buy all the parts separately you’ll come around the same price. The keyboard and mouse are a good gamer starter pack as well!
customer_reviews.author: Armando

customer_reviews.title: The Skytech Shiva Gaming PC
customer_reviews.text: Hello amazon browsers, if your looking for a low budget gaming PC that can stream and play any game you want it to, this is the computer for you. It has all the parts you need to play the hottest titles these days, even something like Red Dead Redemption 2 would run perfectly on this computer. Another plus about the pc is that it is silent. Even when I have a lot of tabs open you cant hear it at all. I really enjoy this PC and recomend it for anybody.
customer_reviews.author: Ashton Hammond

customer_reviews.title: Unable to install Wifi Antenna
customer_reviews.text: I do not know how to install the wifi antenna even after search over all the Internet by Google ....... where is the instruction? Do I have to pay $127 to hire an Amazon professional to help with it?
customer_reviews.author: chao

customer_reviews.title: Perfect!
customer_reviews.text: This thing is awesome!!!! Also, the aesthetics of it is gorgeous. The computer, keyboard, and mouse seem to be of excellent quality.. love it!
customer_reviews.author: paperandiTop Contributor: Baking

customer_reviews.title: Best PC I've ever owned.
customer_reviews.text: I got this PC about 2 weeks ago and it has been working great. It is leagues above my last PC which died on me last December. This PC is fast, quiet and stays cool even in the summer heat. It is also quite the looker with 3 RGB Fans that illuminate in unison. Even comes with a remote to control the lights and patterns. The PC has met every task I have thrown at it so far. Though I lost a lot of my stuff on my last PC so I haven't tested everything out yet. I might update this review after I spend more time with it. But as of now I highly recommend it.
customer_reviews.author: The Hawk

customer_reviews.title: It runs 1440p very well.
customer_reviews.text: I absolutely love this PC. The graphics are amazing. And it is super quiet. It comes with G-sync and V-sync. My games run very smooth with no tearing. It runs 1440p very well. I was getting an average of 80-90 FPS on Fortnite set on epic settings. That’s also with the Nividia graphics card set more in quality than performance. Needless to say. It was a good value. Pretty close to what the parts would cost to build it myself. I am very pleased
customer_reviews.author: Jakob Anderson

customer_reviews.title: Very satisfied with this computor
customer_reviews.text: No problems so far, My daughter uses this pc for gaming. She loves it, It was easy set up, the ssd memory needs to be larger, it needs a hard drive. We bought it knowing this so I will not use it as a fault.
customer_reviews.author: Robert B Hall

customer_reviews.title: Flipping Sweet!
customer_reviews.text: I love the fact you can do the payment plan! Thank you!
customer_reviews.author: Xavier Perkins

customer_reviews.title: GREAT PURCHASE
customer_reviews.text: This PC is amazing for the $1000 price tag and very easily upgrade the cable management is beautiful and I can honestly say I have never in my life come across customer service so helpful truly an amazing purchase especially for a beginner or casual player I get 160 FPS on rainbow six siege with all ultra graphics
customer_reviews.author: Ricky

customer_reviews.title: Amazing Product!
customer_reviews.text: If you are interested in a prebuilt pc for gaming or really anything else, this is the computer for you. It comes prebuilt in a box and all you have to do is plug it in and its ready to use. You get everything that's said in the description. It even comes with a gaming mouse and keyboard. I have no complains at all. I've been using this pc for almost a year now, and it has never given me any issues.
customer_reviews.author: Pankeel

customer_reviews.title: Best bang for the buck although...
customer_reviews.text: It was clear plug and play once I unboxed this pre built. although everything seemed smooth 2 days in the CPU begin to restart without warning. Not paying attention to it because everything else was running right. IT continued for another week or so. I'm on the phone now with technical support. Hopefully its nothing serious.
customer_reviews.author: carlos

customer_reviews.title: Nice and quiet
customer_reviews.text: Fantastic computer, looks great. I primarily bought it to play cities skylines and it's running the game great!
customer_reviews.author: Bennie Hair

customer_reviews.title: A very impressive but noisy pc
customer_reviews.text: This pc came in 9/10. Condition, one of the plastic pieces that holds the glass panel was bent, other than that everything works fine. All the pieces i ordered came in and they all give me very good performance. The only thing I don’t like is the sound of the fans they’re a bit too loud but if you put your headphones on you can’t really hear them, but it comes with 4 fans so it makes sense
customer_reviews.author: Amazon Customer

customer_reviews.title: I’m in love!
customer_reviews.text: My older gaming pc recently stopped working I spent a long time searching for a better pc for gaming!!! This is a great pc and so far everything is great. Could have more storage but it’s ok, the keyboard and mouse is ok too. Awesome price as well. I’m not disappointed.
customer_reviews.author: Alisha

customer_reviews.title: Really great performance, pleasantly surprised!
customer_reviews.text: I always thought spending $2000+ on a gaming PC was the way to go, but I've been really nicely surprised at how efficient this PC is! It looks great, noise levels are low (I really can't hear it) and the value for money is amazing. I mainly run League of Legends/CSGO, and FPS levels are really good, runs everything so smoothly. I definitely recommend this PC, SkyTech have definitely won a loyal customer!
customer_reviews.author: Zach

customer_reviews.title: Great pc, Skytech knows gaming pcs.
customer_reviews.text: Love this pc, i use it for gaming and editing vídeos. So far its handled everything iv Played including the newer code vein game great. Its very quiet. Plugged it in and it was ready to go. Skytech is one company ill be telling people about!
customer_reviews.author: Ghost

customer_reviews.title: Just confused
customer_reviews.text: its a pretty good pc in my opinion runs games really good but they advertise some parts like the fans and the power box if you look in the pics the power box is like blue and mine came with a gigabyte geforce rtx but ive seen people in their reviews where they have a zotac gaming gpu and it confuses me idk if ive lost money iver the gpu confused.
customer_reviews.author: kyle p. wallace

customer_reviews.title: Pretty ok
customer_reviews.text: Smooth gameplay on all AAA titles I’ve installed. Just be aware that the RGB software will likely not be installed so your machine will light up white ever 2 seconds like Christmas lights. It’s annoying and customer support was unable to resolve the problem. The performance is what I payed for so the RGB light issue isn’t a deal breaker but definitely is an annoyance.
customer_reviews.author: william h.

customer_reviews.title: Amazing Computer!!!
customer_reviews.text: I have been wanting a gaming computer for a while but have been a little intimidated to buil my own so i started checking out the skytech prebuilts. I purchased the skytech shiva and couldnt be happier. The computer works great and looks awesome as well. I also trued out using my oculus quest link feature with the shiva and it works amazing! I am very pleased with my purchase of the skytech shiva
customer_reviews.author: ERYN

customer_reviews.title: Excellent
customer_reviews.text: Sleek and well built. Runs very quietly. Access to led features could be a little more accessible but it isn't too complicated. Switched from console to this pc. Allows for fast gaming with no lag and set up is very simple.
customer_reviews.author: Amazon Customer

customer_reviews.title: Great PC with some missing parts.
customer_reviews.text: Great PC so far. Deducted one star because it was missing the power cable, wifi antennas, and ?. I was able to scavenge these from older PCs so I don't know how responsive support would have been.
customer_reviews.author: Monks

customer_reviews.title: This gaming pc is worth the price
customer_reviews.text: i use this product for gaming and i love the design of it and how it runs its been about 3 days and there is no sign of any type of lag. I overall really recommend this product.
customer_reviews.author: Serena

customer_reviews.title: im currently on the pc
customer_reviews.text: This is my new baby i wont have to buy any next gen console again all i have to do is upgrade this pc as needed its a great pre built gaming pc
customer_reviews.author: John carrion

customer_reviews.title: Amazing product for the price!
customer_reviews.text: So far I love it! It runs the games I play extremely smoothly and no problems with it at all. I’m happy with its performance, as well as design, super slick and not like other PCs that go with a black design for the chassis. The only thing I would say against it is it’s a bit on the loud side, but nothing too loud. Overall I’m happy with it, especially since it’s future proof.
customer_reviews.author: CallMeThePurge

customer_reviews.title: Great pc, keyboard malfunction
customer_reviews.text: Installation was simple, pc wasnt damage. I tested if it could run vr and it can. Overall a great pc and id recomment it. Unfortunately for me its keyboard doesnt exactly work. Only three keys doesnt work which is sad because i liked the keyboard.
customer_reviews.author: Lord Chaos

customer_reviews.title: Waste of money
customer_reviews.text: This thing sounds like a jet engine. The game don’t run 1080p for some reason. The motherboard is cheap and the RGB lights don’t work on it or will be bugged out. Do not buy BUILD YOUR OWN. I’m trying to play old games and they can’t even run HD or anything at a solid 60 FPS but every single YouTuber can. Something isn’t right with Skytech
customer_reviews.author: Joseph Oczkowski

customer_reviews.title: Simply perfect
customer_reviews.text: This thing is perfect for my vive cosmo headset, perfect tracking and no stuttering on visuals. Awesome lightning fast and also quite the looker- people always remark how awesome it looks when turned on
customer_reviews.author: Amazon Customer

customer_reviews.title: Solid PC
customer_reviews.text: We bought this for my wife and now after a few months of using it a few times a week to play several different games she loves it. It had one issue where the USB ports weren't working right but it seems after a update the issue seems solved. Also she loves being able to use the remote they sent to customize the lights on the PC. Overall solid PC for the budget
customer_reviews.author: Amazon Customer

customer_reviews.title: great bang for the buck
customer_reviews.text: sleek case, start-up instructions were missing had to google it but keyboard and mouse are better than expected. Had to optimize settings to get it dialed in for witcher 3 and monster hunter but was able to play 4K on medium and it looks good! All I expected thank you!
customer_reviews.author: Elo

customer_reviews.title: Doubt I'll ever have a better PC
customer_reviews.text: Everything I could possibly want to do runs very smoothly! I have yet to have lag spikes in anything I do including the video games that have insane demands. Highly recommend if you want a high tier pc for any possible need you have!
customer_reviews.author: Dantheman

customer_reviews.title: It's expandable, just keep that in mind
customer_reviews.text: So far I love this thing, does everything I need although I haven't really pushed it. If you are looking for a great mid range PC with room to expand. This thing can play all your games and Photoshop pretty well.
customer_reviews.author: Tavia V

customer_reviews.title: Seriously buy this computer
customer_reviews.text: Phenomenal computer if I could rate it higher I would runs games so fast absolutely no lag, very easy to set up, amazing job with padding for shipping, and I love how nice it looks too I'm very happy with my purchase
customer_reviews.author: Freddie Anthony Torres

customer_reviews.title: Great Computer!
customer_reviews.text: I bought this computer in hope to run a high frame rate in a few fps shooter games and battle royales! Once I received the PC, I fell in love right away. Highly recommend this PC!
customer_reviews.author: ColoradoGirl

customer_reviews.title: Good PC Good Price
customer_reviews.text: Pretty good PC. I'm finally running a lot of games on high and it's start up and shut down speeds are fast and east. Wish the PC game with more then a 500GB SSD when my last PC from 2010 came with a 1 Terabyte one but thats fine. Having the case be easily opened is great for cleaning out the PC
customer_reviews.author: Luis Carlos
